verbs.description: [ARG0: hawthornes] to [V: throw] [ARG1: great cider and beer festival] [ARGM-PRP: for second year] hawthornes beer café will host the great cider and beer festival for the second year on saturday nov 4 outside on 11th street from fitzwater to catharine attendees can score 5 pours of more than 50 seasonal beers barrel - aged rarities ciders and wines catharine mass folk commons beer john mcnutt trio hawthornes beer café cider
